entities.name: candles
entities.description: The candles in the hall went out at once.

entities.name: silvery ghosts
entities.description: They were drifting about talking seriously to the prefects and the enchanted ceiling.

entities.name: prefects
entities.description: The silvery ghosts were talking seriously to them.

entities.description: It was scattered with stars like the sky outside.

entities.name: sky

entities.name: teacher
entities.description: A teacher would reappear in the hall to check that everything was quiet.

entities.name: Professor Dumbledore
entities.description: He came into the hall around three in the morning.

entities.name: Percy
entities.description: He was prowling between the sleeping bags telling people off for talking.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: He watched Professor Dumbledore looking around for Percy.

entities.name: Ron

entities.name: Hermione
